title: Shoes Around the World
description: Shoes Around the World is a book about the many different types of shoes found around the world, including babouches from Morocco, klompen from Holland, geta sandals from Japan, Saami reindeer boots from Lapland, cowboy boots from Australia, and sandals from Africa. Each section is dedicated to describing a different kind of shoe, listing its unique characteristics. Photographs and maps support the text.
meta: Australia, babouches, geta, Holland, klompen, Morocco, Norway, Russia, Sweden
Use the reading strategy of summarizing to understand text
Compare and Contrast : Identify details to compare and contrast different types of shoes
Vowel Diphthong : Identify vowel diphthongs ou and ow
Foreign Vocabulary : Understand how to read foreign vocabulary

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
